item.description:
Hello everyone!! I hope you're all keeping cool in this hot weather. We'll have our July meetup on Sunday, July 25th from 11am - 1pm. Weather permitting, we'll be outside and have the pool out.

For those who are coming for the first time, please be sure to check in with the front desk and to bring proof of vaccinations for the rabies, distemper and bordatella (canine cough) vaccines.

If you'd like to schedule a grooming for after the meet up, please call me to make an appointment so I can be sure to have a groomer available.

Looking forward to seeing everyone!

Keep cool.

Agni
item.name: JULY MEET UP
